pr_title: Fix Glob Patterns for Hadoop-Compatible FileSystems

timeline.message:
Fix Glob Patterns for Hadoop-Compatible FileSystems

- Added unit tests
- Added integration tests that test the following:

| Pattern        | Description                                                                                                                                                    |
|----------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| ?              | Matches any single character                                                                                                                                   |
| *              | Matches zero or more characters                                                                                                                                |
| [abc]          | Matches a single character from character set {a,b,c}.                                                                                                         |
| [a-b]          | Matches a single character from the character range {a…b}.                                                                                                     |
| [^a]           | Matches a single character that is not from character set or range {a}. Note that the “^”character must occur immediately to the right of the opening bracket. |
| \c             | Removes (escapes) any special meaning of character c.                                                                                                          |
| {ab,cd}        | Matches a string from the string set {ab, cd}.                                                                                                                 |
| {ab,c{de, fh}} | Matches a string from the string set {ab, cde, cfh}.                                                                                                           |
Use collate for consistent output between OSX and linux
Fix expected error message on cloud
Fix expected error message on cloud
